page.title: 20RESULTS OF SCHOOL SURVEY
page.content: A questionnaire was given to all the children (139) at St. Peter's School. {The results were as follows : 31% boarders 69% daypupils 14% wear glasses 81% have been abroad 75% play a musical instrument 58% have a computer at home 97% have a bicycle 58% have a video at home 91% have a pet or pets { pocket money: 60% 0 to 50p : 27% 51p to Â£1 9% Â£1 to Â£2 : 4% over Â£2 { family size: 3: 14% , 4: 47% , 5:25% , 6: 6% 7: 7% , 8: 1% { popular career choices : doctor/nurse 11% armed forces 7% sportsperson,teacher,pilot 6% farmer,engineer 5% chartered accountant,vet 3%
